languages.text: "Мы отыскали всех, кого могли отыскать, элантах. И все они... оказались мертвы". {n}Безысходность и отчаяние сквозят во взгляде Ирлиэт, и голос ее предательски надламывается.{/n} "Но нить судьбы оборвалась, и я более не знаю, как помочь моему народу. Я не смогла никого спасти. И не смогла узнать правду о гибели Крудараха. Я... потерялась на своем пути. И мне показалось, что ты единственн{mf|ый|ая} на всем корабле, кто сможет это понять".

"We found everyone we could, elantach, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, and her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I no longer know how to help my people. I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."
languages.original_text: "Мы отыскали всех, кого могли отыскать, элантах. И все они... оказались мертвы". {n}Безысходность и отчаяние сквозят во взгляде Ирлиэт, и голос ее предательски надламывается.{/n} "Но нить судьбы оборвалась, и я более не знаю, как помочь моему народу. Я не смогла никого спасти. И не смогла узнать правду о гибели Крудараха. Я... потерялась на своем пути. И мне показалось, что ты единственн{mf|ый|ая} на всем корабле, кто сможет это понять".

traits.locale_text: "We have found everyone we could, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I don't know how to help my people anymore. I couldn't save anyone. And I couldn't find the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought that you are the only one on the entire ship who can understand me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have found everyone we could, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I don't know how to help my people anymore. I couldn't save anyone. And I couldn't find the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought that you are the only one on the entire ship who can understand me."

I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

languages.text: “我们竭尽所能地找到了所有人，外界人，可他们全都……全都死了。”{n}伊莉耶特的目光中闪动着悲怆与绝望，声音也变了调子。{/n}“然而，命运的线索已经中断，我再也不知道该如何帮助我的族人。我没能救回任何人，也没能找到克鲁达拉赫陨落的真相。我……我迷失了方向。我本以为，你是这艘飞船上唯一能够理解我的人。”
languages.original_text: "We found everyone we could, elantach, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, and her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I no longer know how to help my people. I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

traits.locale_text: “我们竭尽所能地找到了所有人，外界人，可他们全都……全都死了。”{n}伊莉耶特的目光中闪动着悲怆与绝望，声音也变了调子。{/n}“然而，命运的线索已经中断，我再也不知道该如何帮助我的族人。我没能救回任何人，也没能找到克鲁达拉赫陨落的真相。我……我迷失了方向。我本以为，你是这艘飞船上唯一能够理解我的人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Encontramos a tantos como pudimos, elantach, y todos... estaban muertos». {n}La angustia y la desesperación brillan en los ojos de Yrliet, y su voz se quiebra delatoramente.{/n} «Pero la hebra del destino se ha roto y ya no sé cómo ayudar a mi gente. No he logrado salvar a nadie. Ni tampoco he averiguado la verdad sobre la destrucción de Crudarach. Yo... me he descarriado. Y creí que tú eras la única persona de toda esta nave que podría entenderme».
languages.original_text: "We found everyone we could, elantach, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, and her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I no longer know how to help my people. I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

traits.locale_text: «Encontramos a tantos como pudimos, elantach, y todos... estaban muertos». {n}La angustia y la desesperación brillan en los ojos de Yrliet, y su voz se quiebra delatoramente.{/n} «Pero la hebra del destino se ha roto y ya no sé cómo ayudar a mi gente. No he logrado salvar a nadie. Ni tampoco he averiguado la verdad sobre la destrucción de Crudarach. Yo... me he descarriado. Y creí que tú eras la única persona de toda esta nave que podría entenderme».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons trouvé tous ceux que nous pouvions, elantach... et ils étaient tous morts. » {n}Le regard d'Yrliet n'exprime plus que le désespoir et sa voix se brise sous la douleur.{/n} « Mais le fil du destin est tranché et je ne sais plus comment aider mon peuple, désormais. Je n'ai pu sauver personne, et je n'ai pas non plus réussi à découvrir la vérité sur la disparition de Crudarach. J'ai... perdu mon chemin, et je pensais que vous seriez la seule personne capable de me comprendre, à bord de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "We found everyone we could, elantach, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, and her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I no longer know how to help my people. I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons trouvé tous ceux que nous pouvions, elantach... et ils étaient tous morts. » {n}Le regard d'Yrliet n'exprime plus que le désespoir et sa voix se brise sous la douleur.{/n} « Mais le fil du destin est tranché et je ne sais plus comment aider mon peuple, désormais. Je n'ai pu sauver personne, et je n'ai pas non plus réussi à découvrir la vérité sur la disparition de Crudarach. J'ai... perdu mon chemin, et je pensais que vous seriez la seule personne capable de me comprendre, à bord de ce vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben alle gefunden, die wir finden konnten, Elantach, und alle ... waren tot." {n}In Yrliets Augen liegen Hoffnungslosigkeit und Verzweiflung, und ihre Stimme bricht.{/n} "Aber der Faden des Schicksals ist gerissen, und ich weiß nicht mehr, wie ich meinen Leuten noch helfen kann. Ich konnte niemanden retten. Und die Wahrheit über den Niedergang von Crudarach habe ich auch nicht erfahren. Ich ... habe meinen Weg verloren. Und ich dachte, Ihr wärt die einzige Person auf dem gesamten Schiff, die das versteht."
languages.original_text: "We found everyone we could, elantach, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, and her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I no longer know how to help my people. I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben alle gefunden, die wir finden konnten, Elantach, und alle ... waren tot." {n}In Yrliets Augen liegen Hoffnungslosigkeit und Verzweiflung, und ihre Stimme bricht.{/n} "Aber der Faden des Schicksals ist gerissen, und ich weiß nicht mehr, wie ich meinen Leuten noch helfen kann. Ich konnte niemanden retten. Und die Wahrheit über den Niedergang von Crudarach habe ich auch nicht erfahren. Ich ... habe meinen Weg verloren. Und ich dachte, Ihr wärt die einzige Person auf dem gesamten Schiff, die das versteht."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタよ、全員を見つけたのだが、その全員が…冷たくなっていた」{n}ユリエットの目に失望と絶望が光り、彼女の声は途切れ途切れになった。{/n}「運命の糸は切れ、もはや民を助ける術など私にはないのだ。誰も救えなかった。クルダラの死について真実を知ることもできなかった。もう…進むべき道を見失ってしまった。この船で理解してくれるのはあなただけだと思ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "We found everyone we could, elantach, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, and her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I no longer know how to help my people. I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、全員を見つけたのだが、その全員が…冷たくなっていた」{n}ユリエットの目に失望と絶望が光り、彼女の声は途切れ途切れになった。{/n}「運命の糸は切れ、もはや民を助ける術など私にはないのだ。誰も救えなかった。クルダラの死について真実を知ることもできなかった。もう…進むべき道を見失ってしまった。この船で理解してくれるのはあなただけだと思ったのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bulabildiğimiz herkesi bulduk elantach, hepsi ölmüştü." {n}Yrliet'in gözleri, umutsuzluk ve kederle kararıyor. Sesi de haince çatallaşıyor.{/n} "Fakat kaderin ipleri koptu, artık soydaşlarıma nasıl yardım edebileceğimi bilmiyorum. Kimseyi kurtaramadım. Crudarach'ın sonu hakkında gerçeği öğrenmeyi başaramadım. Yolumu kaybettim. Bu gemide beni anlayabilecek tek kişinin sen olduğunu düşünmüştüm."
languages.original_text: "We found everyone we could, elantach, and all of them... were dead." {n}Hopelessness and despair gleam in Yrliet's eyes, and her voice breaks treacherously.{/n} "But the thread of fate is broken and I no longer know how to help my people. I failed to save anyone. And I failed to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise. I... have lost my way. And I thought you were the only person on this entire ship who might understand."

traits.locale_text: "Bulabildiğimiz herkesi bulduk elantach, hepsi ölmüştü." {n}Yrliet'in gözleri umutsuzluk ve kederle kararıyor, sesi haince çatallaşıyor.{/n} "Fakat kaderin ipleri koptu, artık soydaşlarıma nasıl yardım edebileceğimi bilmiyorum. Kimseyi kurtaramadım. Crudarach'ın sonu hakkında gerçeği öğrenmeyi başaramadım. Yolumu kaybettim. Bu gemide beni anlayabilecek tek kişinin sen olduğunu düşünmüştüm bir de."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
